features.featureTitle: Update ONLY the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] (the MissionSection mascot image) so its src uses the newly uploaded image file plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp. Add plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp under frontend/public/assets/generated and set the src via the existing base-aware assetPath() helper (e.g., assetPath('assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp')). Do not modify any other elements, styling, layout, text, or images.
